root.name: Rad Racer
root.description: HistoryRad Racer was one of the few Square developed games to be released in the United States before Final Fantasy. The game is notable for being one of the first video games to make use of 3-D, albeit 3-D that didn't work well but 3-D all the same. Square also developed another NES game that utilized 3-D that was released around the same time as Rad Racer and that game is 3-D Worldrunner. Courses S unset Coastline San Francisco Highway Grand Canyon Ruins of Athens Los Angeles Night Way Snow White Line Seaway In Typhoon Last Seaside Running

similar_games.game: Famicom Grand Prix II: 3D Hot Rally
